content.intro_paragraph: ENGLISH Somos un bar de cócteles y restaurante de primer nivel ubicados en Montreal. Nos enorgullece ofrecer un ambiente vibrante, un servicio impecable y un menú que celebra la herencia culinaria de dos culturas extraordinarias
content.index_title_second_block: ENGLISH La esencia de los sabores latinos en cada cóctel
content.content_title_second_block: ENGLISH Ofrecemos una extraordinaria selección de cócteles, meticulosamente preparados para deleitar tu paladar. Nuestro talentoso equipo combina ingredientes frescos y técnicas innovadoras para crear bebidas únicas y deliciosas.

latinClubPage.title: Latin Club
latinClubPage.intro: Join us every Friday and Saturday after 11:00pm when El Lounge transforms into Montreal's hottest Latin club
latinClubPage.content_1: Dance all night to the electrifying beats of our live DJ, playing the best of Latin party music.
latinClubPage.content_2: Dive into the energy of Latin night!
latinClubPage.content_3: Experience the energy and excitement of a true Latin party here at El Lounge.

drinksMenuPage.mocktailsNote:
• Classic Lemonade: Timeless and zesty.
  • Cucumber Lemonade: Crisp with a cool cucumber twist.
  • Coco Lemonade: Tropical fusion of coconut and lemon.
  • Berry Lemonade: Bursting with mixed berry flavors.
  • Mango Lemonade: Sweet, ripe mango in every sip.
  • Passion Fruit Lemonade: An exotic and tangy delight.
  • Strawberry Lemonade: Sweet strawberries meet zesty lemon.

eventsClubPage.title: Events and Gatherings
eventsClubPage.subtitle: Looking for the perfect place for your next event or celebration?
eventsClubPage.content_1: Look no further than El Lounge. Whether you're hosting an intimate gathering, a corporate event, or a birthday party, our versatile space can accommodate groups of all sizes.
eventsClubPage.content_2: Let our dedicated team work with you to create a personalized experience that exceeds your expectations.

productMenu.special_dishes_1: EN Eleva tu experiencia de sabor con nuestro innovador giro en las clásicas arepas colombianas, con una variedad de rellenos sabrosos y coberturas creativas.
productMenu.special_dishes_2: EN Disfruta de los auténticos sabores de Venezuela con nuestra versión de este querido plato nacional, que incluye carne desmechada, frijoles negros, arroz y plátanos maduro
productMenu.special_dishes_3: EN Saborea el refrescante sabor del mar con el ceviche especial de nuestro chef, preparado con una mezcla de influencias colombianas y venezolanas para una experiencia gastronómica verdaderamente inolvidable.

food.menu_degustation: 1 tequeno, 1 tequechapa, 1 beef empanada, 1 pulled pork arepita, 1 ceviche, 1 pulled pork patacon. Served with chimichurri and aioli
food.tequenos_de_platano_maduro: Sweet plantain sticks stuffed with fresh cheese
food.tequechapa: Stuffed corn stick with fresh cheese
food.trio_patacon: 3 patacones: pulled porc with green mayo. Pulled beef with cheddar cheese and garlic mayonnaise. Chicharron with guacamole
food.patacon_pollo: Pulled chicken, sweet corn, lettuce, tomato, cheddar cheese with sauce aioli and plantain
food.yucas_revoltosas: Fried yuca served with our homemade spicy sauce
food.empanadas: Crunchy cornmeal stuffed with aromatic beef and potatoes and Latin seasoning
food.ceviche_de_camaron: Baby shrimp, pico de gallo, lime, with fried plantain chips
food.ceviche_de_pescado: Healthy ceviche made with fresh fish, lime juice , cilantro and red onion
food.calamares: Fresh and tender squid with lemon home-made sauce
food.mini_arepas: 3 arepitas: pulled porc with green mayo. Pulled beef with cheddar cheese and garlic mayonnaise. Chicharron with guacamole
food.wings: Chicken wings coated in homemade BBQ sauce with a spicy kick
food.chili: Arepa Chips topped with our exclusive chili sauce, guacamole, sour cream, pico de gallo, and melted cheese
food.asado_for_two: Selection of Picanha, chicken breast, pork and chorizos, served with mixed salad, fries and yuca with mojo sauce
food.american_burger: 5 oz beef patty, brioche bread, cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, onion accompanied by French Fries
food.la_pana_burger: 5 oz beef patty , brioche bread, chicken breast, fried cheddar cheese, tomato, onions, cabbage and potato chips accompanied by French Fries
food.la_parce_burger: 5 oz beef patty, brioche bread, sweet plantain, feta cheese, chorizo, sweet corn and avocado accompanied by French Fries
food.pulled_pork_burger: Juicy pulled pork burger with our special BBQ sauce, served with coleslaw and pickles
food.patacon_carne: Pulled beef, lettuce and tomato, sweet corn, cheddar cheese with sauce aioli and plantain
food.patacon_pernil: Pulled pork, lettuce and tomato, corn, cheddar cheese, our green mayonnaise and plantain
food.chicharron: Pork belly, served with patacon, topped with pico de Gallo
food.grilled_chicken: Grilled chicken breast served with fries and a house salad
food.arepa_de_pernil: Pulled Pork, cheddar cheese, chorizo, and with our green mayo
food.arepa_de_carne: Pulled beef, fried cheddar cheese, chorizo with our garlic mayonnaise
food.arepa_de_chicharron: Pork belly, sweet plantain with guacamole
food.arepa_de_pollo: Delicious arepa stuffed with stewed chicken and melted cheese
food.smoked_meat_arepa: Arepa filled with succulent pastrami and fresh arugula
food.poutine: Cheese curds, fries, and poutine gravy
food.poutine_latino_quebecoise: Pulled pork, pork belly, cheese curds, french fries and poutine gravy
food.ensalada_cesar:
Roman lettuce, house dressing, croutons and parmesan cheese
+ grilled chicken $5
food.salade_verte: Tomatoes, cucumber, carrots, arcadian lettuce, and red wine dressing
food.tequenos_de_nutella: Stuffed stick with nutella and vanilla ice cream

drinks.mexicana:
Like the typical Mexican Paloma with a fun twist, mixing fresh watermelon, Chile ancho, and tequila.
Crafted with Tequila 1800 Silver
drinks.el_ritual:
Inspired in the core of Point Bar Lounge, performing our House Rum, Diplomático Reserva mixed with fruits like passion fruit and mango, smoked with rosemary and a hit of bitters, our must Instagramable drink... it's a MUST.
Crafted with Diplomatico reserva
drinks.patron_margarita:
Sip perfection with our Patrón Perfect Margarita at PointBar Lounge. Crafted with fresh ingredients and Patrón Silver, it's the ultimate classic.
Lime, Passion fruit, Mango, Blue and Hibiscus
Crafted with Tequila Patron Silver
drinks.passion_duck:
Passion Fruit, Cirka Gin, zesty lime, our secret syrup, all crowned with a splash of Tonic 1642 and a touch of Aperol, garnished with our charming duck. "Ducktastic".
Crafted with Cirka Gin
drinks.la_rosa_letal:
With this drink we wanted to present a type of Old Fashioned mixed with the Mexican culture… Tequila and Mezcal…this drink is for the brave ones.
Crafted with Tequila 1800
drinks.pasion_de_mezcal: This Mezcalita is based on passion fruit and orange juice, great for the summer weather and start the party.
drinks.amazona: One of our favorite cocktails of summer 2022, this electric version of the Long Island ice Tea will make you feel dangerous and exotic with its blend of liquors mixed with Midori and natural lemonade.
drinks.pepigin:
Chili vodka, cucumber pure, tajin, lime and soda 1642
Crafted with Cirka Gin
drinks.limoncello_spritz: The Limoncello Spritz is a delightful combination of vodka,limoncello and prosecco that will transport you to an Italian lemon grove
drinks.medellin_mule: Is a Colombian variation of the famous classic Moscow Mule featuring Aguardiente, now available in Montreal! With a touch of passion fruit, ginger beer and lime. A true delight!
drinks.yuzu_melon: A cocktail with vodka, watermelon and Yuzu (Japanese citrus fruit) is a refreshing and exotic drink. Offers a unique combination of tart, sweet and herbaceous notes, perfect for hot summer days!
drinks.grand_marnier: Grand Marnier,1800 silver, lemon and plain syrup
drinks.mezcalita: Mezcal, squeezed orange, lime, plain syrup
drinks.mojitos: Flavors: Maracuyá (passion fruit), clásico (limón), fresa,  cereza, coco, durazno, mango
drinks.margaritas: Flavors: Maracuyá (passion fruit), clásico (limón), fresa,, cereza, coco, durazno, mango
drinks.daiquiri: Flavors: Maracuyá (passion fruit), clásico (limón), fresa,, cereza, coco, durazno, mango
drinks.bloody_caesar: Black Sauces mixed, lime, valentine, Tajin, Clamato and vodka
drinks.michelada_cubana: Black Sauces mixed, lime, valentine, Tajin, Clamato and beer
drinks.pina_colada: Malibu Rhum, pineapple, and coconut cream
drinks.caipirinha: The classic Brazilian cocktail made with cachaça, lime and sugar
drinks.jagger_lemonade: Made with a pineapple lemonade too with jagermeister
drinks.paloma: Tequila, grapefruit juice, lime and soda
drinks.martini: Classic martini with vodka or gin… dirty, or something extra dirty…
drinks.gin_tonic: Gin, tonic water, lime and syrup
drinks.long_island_ice_tea: Tequila, rum, vodka, gin, coke and lime
drinks.mai_tai: Dark rum, pineapple juice and almond syrup
drinks.pandita: Vodka, strawberry, secret mix with a gummy bear at the bottom
drinks.pitufo: Malibu Rum, piña colada mix, Curaçao
drinks.uppercut: Amaretto and vodka with orange juice
drinks.tinto_de_verano: Red wine, Havana rum, triple sec, seven up, orange and banana syrup
drinks.la_rosada: White wine, disaronno, chic choc spice rum, pink lemonade, orange and lime
drinks.blame_the_aperol: Aperol, peach schnapps, passion fruit, soda, a mix of natural juices and white wine
drinks.free_the_litchi: Gin Beefeater, litchi, strawberry, a mix of natural juices, and tonic water, infused with smoked rosemary and white wine
drinks.pino_noir_bicicleta: A fresh and elegant Pinot Noir best served with white fish, salmon, duck, and game.
drinks.zonin_valpolicella_ripasso: Ample and complex, with vinous tones and well-defined notes of cherry and cocoa powder
drinks.le_focaie_rocca_di_montemassi: Intense and broad, it is expressed with pleasant notes of violet, cherry, and small red fruits
drinks.le_naturel: The attack, rich in fresh fruit, demonstrates its provenance from high vines. Le Naturel stands out for its lightness, not without its complexity and ease of consumption.
drinks.cabolani_pinot_grigio: The sip is fresh and juicy. Ripe fruit, golden apple, and salty notes make this wine persistent on the finish
drinks.la_hitaire_les_tours: A delicate, refreshing wine of magnificent intensity. Floral citrus aromas with beautiful nuances of exotic fruits
drinks.la_hitaire_chardonnay: Woody notes of fresh butter, hazelnut, and yellow peach. A very fresh, powerful, and rich attack on the palate, followed by a nice length on the finish
drinks.bourgogne_aligote: White flower aromas with a discreet almond note. Fresh and crisp, perfect as an aperitif for a kir, this wine will also accompany fish and seafood prepared simply. Serve between 50F - 54 F.
drinks.cote_des_roses_syrah: This wine embodies the South of France lifestyle. Fresh and fruity, this Languedoc is ideal at 10 C as an aperitif or with selfish and subtly spiced dishes.
drinks.pinot_noir_rose_bicicleta: This fresh and vibrant Rose is ideal to enjoy slightly chilled as an aperitif or pair with salads, fish, or vegetarian dishes
drinks.zonin_prosecco: Irresistibly intense, very fruity and aromatic
drinks.zonin_prosecco_rose: Aromatic and fruity bouquet with rich notes of Reinette apple and red fruits, including wild strawberries
drinks.champagne_nicolas_feuillatte_reserve_exc: Notes of juicy pears and crunchy apricots mingle around a fine and delicate bubble
drinks.champagne_veuve_clicquot: Lemony richness on the nose, a struck-match character that falls in with a lemon vanilla note. Toffee apple allure on the palate with chalky coolness and a savory, nutty finish.
drinks.limonada: Sip your way through our Lemonade Oasis and choose your perfect refreshment.
drinks.la_michi: Bloody mix, nonalcoholic corona beer, Valentina, tajin, lemon, and cucumber
